person.persName: Mary "Polly" Ann Southgate Hitch (Falmouth, Pendleton County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Pendleton County, Kentucky, washwoman. Kentucky native. Daughter of Allen Southgate and Charity Southgate. Mother of John O. Ayers. Married to Caleb Hitch. Mother of John Hitch, Susan Hitch, and William Hitch. Resident of Pendleton County in 1850. Washwoman in Pendleton County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person, her husband Caleb Hitch, in Pendleton County from 1859 to 1865.
